hoatChat: Vitamin A 1000IU, vitamin D3 200IU. Vitamin B1 1mg, vitamin B2 1mg, vitamin B5 1mg, vitamin B6 1,34 mg, vitamin PP 10mg, Calci, phosphor, kali, đồng, magnesi, mangan, kẽm.
